articles.content:
MILWAUKEE (AP) Clinicians had to discard about 500 doses of the Moderna vaccine after vials were kept unrefrigerated for too long at Aurora Medical Center in Grafton.
Advocate Aurora Health official… [+553 chars]

articles.title: LA residents can use their phones to provide COVID-19 vaccination proof - Engadget
articles.description: Los Angeles County has teamed with startup Healthvana on an app that will that will store vaccination records in Google or Apple wallets.
articles.content: After seeing record COVID-19 deaths and hospitalizations, Los Angeles County will use technology to help residents track and prove their vaccination records, Bloomberg reports. The public health depa… [+846 chars]

articles.author: Los Angeles Times
articles.title: After Disney employee says she got COVID-19 vaccine, Redlands hospital confirms some lower-priority workers are getting shots - KTLA
articles.description: Nearly as soon as the COVID-19 vaccine was made available in California, accounts started emerging of people skipping the priority line ahead of front-line workers and long-term care residents. Most recently, a 33-year-old Disney employee revealed on Facebook…
articles.content:
